document.full_text: the nfl's request for a temporary stay on the injunction that lifted the league's lockout of players was granted on friday, bringing the lockout back into effect -- for now, at least.
document.title: court grants nfl temporary stay on injunction
lines_and_colors: the nfl's request for a temporary stay on the injunction that lifted the league's lockout of players was granted on friday, bringing the lockout back into effect -- for now, at least.
